'''Tutorials''' are unlocked by encountering or triggering its relevant entry. Unlocked tutorials can be revisited in the [[Archive]]. Each tutorial unlocked rewards {{Item|Primogem|30|x=1-2}}.

There are a total of {{Category Total|Tutorials|not=Uncategorized Tutorials|uses=Template:Tutorial}} Tutorials.
